channel.title: Bugården on Booster Conference 2023 Bergen
channel.description: Recent content in Bugården on Booster Conference 2023 Bergen

item.title: Let your hands do the thinking!
item.description: In this workshop we will explore the power of LEGO® SERIOUS PLAY® a facilitation method which stimulates play, fun and creativity by using LEGO® bricks. We will experience surprising results when thinking with our hands. LEGO® SERIOUS PLAY® can be used for a broad range of topics - e.g. problem solving, strategy creation and teambuilding. Come join me for a different and energizing workshop - forget the post-it notes, we will only use LEGO® bricks so bring your inner child along!
